doc.title: Changing Worlds
doc.plot: A lot can happen when an honest, young, naive Japanese man visits a foreign country for the first time. It can become even more complicated when the visit is a most unusual homestay with three single, American men with extremely diverse and... unique personalities. Stir in some language barriers, cultural faux pas and a bright, young Japanese female undergrad, and the intensity of the experience heightens to comical proportions.
